tool_description: API covering real time URLs of latest oil and gas, renewable energy articles from major UK/international newspapers; for Natural Language Processing (NLP) or energy news update usage
name: Oil and Gas/ Renewable Energy News
title: Oil and Gas/ Renewable Energy News
tool_name: Oil and Gas/ Renewable Energy News

api_list.name: Get all Oil and Gas, Renewable Energy News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back latest news about oil and gas, energy from major newspapers in the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oil-and-gas-renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oil-and-gas-renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://oil-and-gas-renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oil-and-gas-renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
